thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Elaine O Connor
thread.title_full: MicksGarage.com reviewed by Elaine O Connor

author: Elaine O Connor
title: Elaine O Connor
text: I contacted Micksgarage online chat support to clarify an issue I couldn't figure out from the online description. Mikey was very helpful in that he investigated the query quickly and answered all subsequent queries with the same promptness. Unfortuneately, the part I was enquiring about was not available and Mikey did not try and coax me into purchasing it anyway without a known leadtime or to buy another product just to get a sale. I appreciate this honesty in any sales job. His help will more than likely result in a sale soon just not today. Thank you for time and patience with my query today. I have purchased other goods from Micksgarage and the entire service is excellent.
